**Hello, I'm Hygor!**

I am a Data Scientist working as a consultant in projects for different areas like retail, health care, supply chain, etc.

I also have more than seven years of experience as a Systems Architect, Analyst and Software Engineer in the development of web-based and mobile applications.

In my Masters, I worked with research in the Machine Learning area, mainly in the development of a method related to semi-supervised learning.

My interest is mainly in working on solutions that need to employ the use of data, AI, and Machine Learning methods to deliver better or new capabilities for the users.

2019 - Masters in Computer Science with focus on Computational Intelligence - Universidade Federal de Juiz de Fora (UFJF)
